name: Barista Simulator
description:
Barista Simulator is a single player barista coffee simulation game. The game allows you to experience what Barista makes. Get ready to work with coffee machines. You can make a wide variety of coffees and you must be able to upgrade your machines to unlock new coffee recipes. Just some of the coffees you can make are Black coffee, Latte, Cappuccino, Espresso, Green Tea, Black Tea etc.

The customers coming to your shop will want various coffees and you should improve your machines to make the coffees they want.

It's your choice to make your own specialty coffee blend, but first make sure your customers are happy with it.



- You can play real coffee machine experience with realistic graphics.

- Progress and create your own recipes for upgradeable coffee machines and real coffee varieties.

- How you treat customers who are dissatisfied with their coffee is entirely up to you.

- Wide variety of coffee recipes. (Latte, Cappuccino, Espresso, Green Tea, Black Tea etc.)

- Shop items and shop management system that can be upgraded in-game.
